inclusion.criterion: Multiple Myeloma in any of the following disease categories
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Forced vital capacity (FVC); Forced expiratory volume in 1 second (FEV1), forced vital capacity (FVC) and Carbon Monoxide Diffusing Capacity (DL CO) >40%
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Serum bilirubin <2 times upper limit of normal, SGPT <4 times upper limit of normal
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: No evidence of chronic active hepatitis or cirrhosis. No effusion or ascites >1L prior to drainage
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Patient or guardian able to sign informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Corrected QT interval less than 500 msec
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Corrected QT interval greater than 500 msec
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients in complete remission (defined as the absence of monoclonal protein on serum and urine immunofixation electrophoresis, and the absence of plasmacytosis in bone marrow aspirate and biopsy)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has multiple myeloma, s/p allogeneic transplant with recurrent disease and systemic amyloidosis. She is on hemodialysis for ESRD and represents for malaise, weakness, and generalized body aching x 2 days.
